item.description:
What: Pi Day Party
When: March 12, 2011 @ 6:00pm
Where: Private Home (will email yay sayers a week in advance)

What to do:

1. RSVP Yes to this here.
2. Check this link out to see what others are bringing: http://tinyurl.com/29...
3. Click on this link to let us know which "round" dish you're bringing: http://tinyurl.com/2e...
4. We'll email you our location / contact info a week before the party
5. Show up to Eat, Drink & Be Merry as we celebrate Pi Day and commemorate Albert Einstein's birthday.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Pi Day Party
